template.text:
Building registration application
 
You authorised  someone to apply to register %buildingName% for you.
 
They named you as the %orgLeadContact%
 
If you are not the Principal accountable person for this building contact at www.hse.gov.uk/register-a-rise-building/contact
 
Application Number
 
Your application number is %applicationId%
 
Keep this safe. You may need it if you contact us
 
What you need to do next 
 
The person who completed the application for you told us about other people organisations who are also accountable for this building. You must tell those people and organisations that they have been named as accountable persons for this building.
 
The person you authorised also needs to prepare some information about the structure and safety of the building. We will contact you again when we need them to give us that information 
 
Why you got this email 
 
You were named in an application to register a rise-building with the Building Safety Regulator.
 
From Health and Safety Executive.
 
You can apply to register at another high-rise building at any time at www.hse.gov.uk/register-a-rise-building
